sys_sg_write_back_action_item.name: New (Purchase Order)
sys_sg_write_back_action_item.template: asset_operation={{Purchase Order asset_operation}}^assigned_to={{Purchase Order assigned_to}}^bill_to={{Purchase Order bill_to}}^budget_number={{Purchase Order budget_number}}^contract={{Purchase Order contract}}^department={{Purchase Order department}}^description={{Purchase Order description}}^due_by={{Purchase Order due_by}}^expected_delivery={{Purchase Order expected_delivery}}^init_request={{Purchase Order init_request}}^location={{Purchase Order location}}^number={{Purchase Order number}}^ordered={{Purchase Order ordered}}^po_date={{Purchase Order po_date}}^received={{Purchase Order received}}^EQ
